nodes.text: Korbin was a planet in the Inner Rim.
Lawless and without government, control of Korbin's cities were held by various criminal factions, with Korbin itself being considered an excellent port for pirates.
Formerly a mining colony that exported minerals under Cross-Galactic Mining, when the mines ran dry the planet's chief export became the export of fermented kyrf.
Rebel lieutenant Ayla Shar was a native of Korbin.
